Summary: we saw a bright light ball shape fly downward in the sky and it was green a big green lime green ball of light at around 3 am just shoot downward thro the sky behind the trees
divs: Sighting Detailsi was sitting on the couch talking to my husband and we could see from the corner of our eyes a large bright light green light at that and we turned and watched it shoot downward across the sky and behind the trees and it was huge and green lime green big and so bright and moving fast and i am glad we got to see it so good we prayed and was glad we saw it from an open window. we thought it was a metoer.
